net.minecraftforge.fluids

类 FluidRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.fluids.FluidRegistry

  • public abstract class FluidRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles Fluid registrations. Fluids MUST be registered in order to function.

      • WATER

    • 方法详细资料

      • initFluidIDs

        public static void initFluidIDs(<any> newfluidIDs,
                                java.util.Set<java.lang.String> defaultNames)
        Called by Forge to prepare the ID map for server -> client sync. Modders, DO NOT call this.

      • registerFluid

        public static boolean registerFluid(Fluid fluid)
        Register a new Fluid. If a fluid with the same name already exists, registration the alternative fluid is tracked in case it is the default in another place
        参数:
        fluid - The fluid to register.
        返回:
        True if the fluid was registered as the current default fluid, false if it was only registered as an alternative

      • isFluidDefault

        public static boolean isFluidDefault(Fluid fluid)
        Is the supplied fluid the current default fluid for it's name
        参数:
        fluid - the fluid we're testing
        返回:
        if the fluid is default

      • isFluidRegistered

        public static boolean isFluidRegistered(Fluid fluid)
        Does the supplied fluid have an entry for it's name (whether or not the fluid itself is default)
        参数:
        fluid - the fluid we're testing
        返回:
        if the fluid's name has a registration entry

      • isFluidRegistered

        public static boolean isFluidRegistered(java.lang.String fluidName)

      • getFluid

        public static Fluid getFluid(java.lang.String fluidName)

      • getFluidName

        public static java.lang.String getFluidName(Fluid fluid)

      • getFluidName

        public static java.lang.String getFluidName(FluidStack stack)

      • getFluidStack

        public static FluidStack getFluidStack(java.lang.String fluidName,
                                       int amount)

      • getRegisteredFluids

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Fluid> getRegisteredFluids()
        Returns a read-only map containing Fluid Names and their associated Fluids.

      • getRegisteredFluidIDs

        @Deprecated
public static java.util.Map<Fluid,java.lang.Integer> getRegisteredFluidIDs()
        已过时。 
        Returns a read-only map containing Fluid Names and their associated IDs. Modders should never actually use this, use the String names.

      • enableUniversalBucket

        public static void enableUniversalBucket()
        Enables the universal bucket in forge. Has to be called before pre-initialization. Actually just call it statically in your mod class.

      • isUniversalBucketEnabled

        public static boolean isUniversalBucketEnabled()

      • addBucketForFluid

        public static boolean addBucketForFluid(Fluid fluid)
        Registers a fluid with the universal bucket. This only has an effect if the universal bucket is enabled.
        参数:
        fluid - The fluid that the bucket shall be able to hold
        返回:
        True if the fluid was added successfully, false if it already was registered or couldn't be registered with the bucket.

      • getBucketFluids

        public static java.util.Set<Fluid> getBucketFluids()
        All fluids registered with the universal bucket
        返回:
        A read-only set containing the fluids

      • hasBucket

        public static boolean hasBucket(Fluid fluid)

      • lookupFluidForBlock

        public static Fluid lookupFluidForBlock(Block block)

      • getMaxID

        public static int getMaxID()

      • getDefaultFluidName

      • getModId

        public static java.lang.String getModId(FluidStack fluidStack)

        public static void loadFluidDefaults(NBTTagCompound tag)

      • writeDefaultFluidList

        public static void writeDefaultFluidList(NBTTagCompound forgeData)

      • validateFluidRegistry

        public static void validateFluidRegistry()
